name: Allegations Of Corruption
Lore: 'With the Republic groaning under the weight of its own bureaucracy, senators accuse, bicker, and fight to further their own agendas.',
Text: 'Plays on table. Once per game, may use 1 Force to stack one Interrupt just played here. To play any new Interrupt of the same name, player must first stack it here and use +1 Force for each Interrupt in stack, even if Interrupt is normally free.',
